ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: shooting up great sparks the size of castles,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It will throw out sparks as logs of wood
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: it indeed throws up sparks like castles,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The fire will shoot out sparks as big as huge towers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed hell throws up sparks like huge castles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, it (Hell) throws sparks (huge) as Al-Qasr,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely it sends up sparks like palaces,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: that shoots sparks like dry faggots,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! it throweth up sparks like the castles,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and throwing up sparks as huge as towers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily it shall cast forth sparks like Unto a castle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed it throws up [giant] sparks like castles,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Indeed it throws about sparks (huge) as Forts,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! It (Hell) throws sparks (huge) as Al-Qasr [a fort or a Qasr (huge log of wood)],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: it throws spits as (high as a huge) palace,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:32] Indeed it, that is, the Fire, throws up sparks, namely, those [flame] that are thrown by it into the air, [huge] like palace edifices, in terms of their enormity and vertical extension,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! It) i.e. the Fire (throweth up sparks like the castles) like the bases of huge trees,
